properties.areaDesc: St. Clair, IL; St. Louis City, MO; St. Louis, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 12:02PM CST until January 15 at 7:20PM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in St. Louis has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...


Mississippi River at Mel Price LD

Mississippi River at St. Louis

River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast
precipitation for the next 48 hours.

The National Weather Service in St. Louis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at St. Louis
* from Sunday afternoon to Wednesday evening.
* At 11:30 AM Saturday the stage was 22.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 30.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage tomorrow
afternoon and crest near 32.5 feet by Monday early afternoon. The
river is forecast to fall below flood stage by Tuesday early
afternoon.
* Impact:  At 32.0 feet...Flood panels at Carr Street and Poplar
Street are installed.  Water will reach the base of the floodgates
at Carr Street at 35 feet, and at Poplar Street at 36.5 feet.
properties.instruction:
Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even
higher than predicted.  The National Weather Service will monitor
this developing situation and issue follow up statements as
conditions or forecasts change.

Safety message:  Never drive cars, trucks, or sport utility vehicles
through flooded areas.  The water may be too deep to allow for safe
passage.

This product, along with additional weather and stream information,
is available at http://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
